Entries.1116017/f Haley {{MinFriendship}}/O Hale: ragtime/-10000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 2 Haley -100 -100 0/skippable/makeInvisible 63 17 6 1/warp farmer -100 -100/viewport 64 15 clamp true/warp Haley 68 17/faceDirection Haley 0/pause 2000/textAboveHead Haley "All right, let's see if there's any mail today..."/pause 3000/shake Haley 250/playSound trashcan/pause 400/emote Haley 8/pause 1000/textAboveHead Haley "What's this?"/pause 3000/emote Haley 40/pause 500/emote Haley 32/pause 400/move Haley -4 0 0/move Haley 0 -1 0/warp farmer 64 15/playSound doorClose/pause 100/emote Haley 16 true/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Haley "Oh, hi honey!"/pause 300/emote farmer 8/speak Haley "I was just checking if there was any mail today."/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 250/speak Haley "Hey, actually, dear...$l"/pause 400/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak Haley "I just got a letter from my sister.#$b#She invited me to go with her to the Desert to visit her friend Sandy.#$b#Now that the Bus is repaired, we can all go to the Desert more often."/pause 500/speak Haley "Would you want to go with me, honey? The Desert is a great place for photos...the scenery is perfect.#$b#It would be some time with just each other...$l#$b#Exploring the vast Desert and taking pictures of memories that will last a lifetime...I can't think of anything more romantic to do with my spouse.$l"/pause 500/speak Haley "Well, honey?"/pause 200/question fork0 "Go on a date with Haley?#Yes#No"/fork dateYes/playMusic none/pause 1000/emote Haley 28/speak Haley "Oh...$s#$b#Too busy again?$s"/pause 500/faceDirection Haley 3 true/pause 1000/emote Haley 40/pause 400/faceDirection Haley 0/pause 400/speak Haley "It's okay, we'll do it some other time. You just get back to work."/pause 600/move farmer 1 0 3/move Haley 0 -1 0/playSound doorClose/warp Haley -100 -100/pause 700/move farmer -1 0 2/pause 1500/end dialogue Haley "Don't worry, I'm not upset.#$b#I know you're busy...I knew what I was getting into when I married you.#$b#We'll go some other time, I guess...$s"
Entries.dateYes: pause 200/addMailReceived haleyDesertDateAgree/emote Haley 20/pause 500/speak Haley "Yay! Thanks, @!$h#$b#This will be so much fun. Just come to the bus stop anytime before 5:00 PM today. I'll grab some things, then I'll be waiting with Emily for you."/pause 500/speak Haley "I can't wait to spend time with you, @.$l"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end dialogue Haley "I'm so excited, dear.$h#$b#I'm just gonna finish packing then I'll head out to the bus stop.#$b#Just come by before 5 and we'll be on our way!$h"
